messages.subject: Our Military Heros
messages.msgSnippet: Subject: Bush Has More to Hide ... http://www.talion.com/admin.html
messages.messageBody:
Subject: Bush Has More to Hide


> 1. Photocopy of order suspending George W. Bush from military flying duty:
> <a href="http://www.talion.com/suspension.html">
> http://www.talion.com/suspension.html </a>
>
> 2. Photocopy of George W. Bush military document redacted for
> "administrative reasons"
> <a href="http://www.talion.com/admin.html">
http://www.talion.com/admin.html
> </a>
>
> 3. Photocopy: Agreement (reneged on after disobeying orders.) Signed by
> George W. Bush
> <a href="http://www.talion.com/signature.html">
> http://www.talion.com/signature.html </a>
>
> 4. Photocopy: George W. Bush allowed to substitute civilian duties for
> flying duties
> (Viet Nam era) following his refusal to take physical and drug test
> <a href="http://www.talion.com/missing.html">
> http://www.talion.com/missing.html </a>
>
> 5. Photocopy: Statement agreeing to ORS Duty if he fails to complete
> military obligations satisfactorily, signed by George W. Bush
> <a href="http://www.talion.com/signature2.html">
> http://www.talion.com/signature2.html </a>
>
> 6. Photocopy: Assignment of George W. Bush to ORS disciplinary unit in
> Denver
> <a href="http://www.talion.com/punish.html">
> http://www.talion.com/punish.html </a>
